name: Total Duel
description:
"Total Duel" is a fun local-multiplayer fencing game, where the goal is to destroy the enemy player. When the two swords collide, the game enters into a slow-mo state, where the players can move their weapons normally, but the characters' movement is slowed down. If someone eliminates the enemy player, they get a point, and the first one to reach five points wins.

Controls:

Red player (Mouse and Keyboard):

  • A- Move left
  • D-Move right
  • G-Extend/Retract weapon
  • Mouse-Rotate weapon
  • Space-Jump

Blue player (Controller):

  • Left stick-Move player left/right
  • Left button-Extend/Retract weapon
  • Right stick-Rotate weapon
  • Right trigger-Jump
